## Company--wide reports

Organization--wide reports are provided in two forms: ***full*** and ***abridged***. The full report contains descriptive information regarding survey results including overall engagement scores, motives, components, individual item rankings, and any past--years' comparisons. The abridged report contains an overall engagement aggregate as well as individual item rankings. Both reports also provide context to the broader survey as well as [VIBE]{.vibe} personnel contact information. Neither report includes normative/benchmark information regarding comparisons to other organizations (this comparative information is only included in the client dashboard).
